chapter.title: Web Application Security
chapter.para: Web application development is one of the most popular usages of Ruby language thanks to the popularity of Ruby on Rails. Following chapter is dedicated to security of web applications with most of the content being framework-independent, while examples and implmentation specific problems are targeted to Ruby on Rails.
Ruby on Rails as a popular web framework already helps with a web application security by providing secure defaults, useful helper methods, automatic html escaping etc.
